attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
See the irony -in this petition to Halt e-petitions, then smile or grimace - but please read on. 

E-Petitions are unfair and elitist - not all people can access the web. They can be hijacked by largley negetive 'bandwagon' causes which do not encourage an even sided open minded and informed debate.

If one has to keep e-based dialogue why not instead replace petitions with invitations to suggest multiple options for solutions to important problems - to encourage people at least to see different sides of the problem first before voting for elected solutions. Access to independent factual information should be given priority for each issue and this provision mediated by invited independent stakeholders panel, i.e. members of opposition parties, NGOs, Academics, Journalists relevant to the problem debated.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
